attributes.action: publicly explain why the vast sums in fuel tax and road tax are not spent on the roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Enormous sums are raised in various taxes - fule duty, road tax, congestion charges, VAT on the product, VAT on the taxes.
Why is this money not spent on actually doing something about improving the road system?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
